titleStmt.title: The present state of the Protestants in France in three letters / written by a gentleman at London to his friend in the country.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman at London.

notesStmt.note: "The first shews the privileges granted them by the Edict of Nantes. The second sets forth the injustice that is done them and the cruelties that are used to force them to renounce their religion. The third vindicates their innocence and their loyalty."
